Name: Janie Jones
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A long gin laced apple and ginger cocktail.
History: Created in 2010 by Mike Atkinson at the Badem House, Goa, India and named after the classic 1970's punk song by British band 'The Clash'. The two maraschino cherries represent Janie Jones herself who famously appeared at a London film premiere in 1964 wearing a topless dress.
Nutrition: One serving of Janie Jones contains 205 calories
